constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 44 (Tuesday, March 9, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. DAVID SCOTT of Georgia:
H.R. 1711.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H1190]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

title: Financial Inclusion in Banking Act of 2021
